hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
source /home/test/.bashrc #Install the Dependencies #sudo yum install -y wget tar java-1.8.0-ibm.s390x java-1.8.0-ibm-devel.s390x sudo yum install -y wget tar
export WORK_DIR=`pwd` # Using ibm node for running this job cd $WORK_DIR wget http://public.dhe.ibm.com/ibmdl/export/pub/systems/cloud/runtimes/java/8.0.5.16/linux/s390x/ibm-java-s390x-sdk-8.0-5.16.bin wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/zos-spark/scala-workbench/master/files/installer.properties.java tail -n +3 installer.properties.java | tee installer.properties cat installer.properties chmod +x ibm-java-s390x-sdk-8.0-5.16.bin sudo ./ibm-java-s390x-sdk-8.0-5.16.bin -r installer.properties export JAVA_HOME=/opt/ibm/java export PATH=$JAVA_HOME/bin:$PATH java -version
#Install Nodejs cd $WORK_DIR wget https://nodejs.org/dist/v8.2.0/node-v8.2.0-linux-s390x.tar.gz tar xvf node-v8.2.0-linux-s390x.tar.gz mv node-v8.2.0-linux-s390x nodejs export PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/sbin:$WORK_DIR/nodejs/bin node -v
#Install PM2 npm install pm2@2.10.2 -g
#Verification
echo "var http = require('http'); var server = http.createServer(function (request, response) { response.writeHead(200, {\"Content-Type\": \"text/plain\"}); response.end(\"Welcome to pm2\n\"); }); server.listen(8080); console.log(\"Server running at http://127.0.0.1:8080/\");" > app.js
#Run the application pm2 start app.js sleep 30s curl http://127.0.0.1:8080/
#pm2 monit
pm2 stop all sleep 30s pm2 kill sleep 20s
pm2 -version
